name: Ningguang
desc: The Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.

elemSkill.name: Jade Screen
elemSkill.desc: Ningguang creates a Jade Screen out of gold, obsidian and her great opulence, dealing AoE Geo DMG. Jade Screen ·Blocks opponents' projectiles. ·Endurance scales based on Ningguang's Max HP. Jade Screen is considered a Geo Construct and can be used to block certain attacks, but cannot be climbed. Only one Jade Screen may exist at any one time. The canvas of stars is written upon this jade screen.

elemBurst.name: Starshatter
elemBurst.desc: Gathering a great number of gems, Ningguang scatters them all at once, sending homing projectiles at her opponents that deal massive Geo DMG. If Starshatter is cast when a Jade Screen is nearby, the Jade Screen will fire additional gem projectiles at the same time. Stars shatter. Silence falls.

attackSkill.name: Normal Attack: Sparkling Scatter
attackSkill.desc:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Shoots gems that deal <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>.
Upon hit, this grants Ningguang 1 Star Jade.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of stamina to fire off a giant gem that deals <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>.
If Ningguang has any Star Jades, unleashing a Charged Attack will cause the Star Jades to be fired at the enemy as well, dealing additional DMG.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Gathering the might of Geo, Ningguang plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <color=#FFE699FF>AoE Geo DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Backup Plan
talents.desc: When Ningguang is in possession of Star Jades, her Charged Attack does not consume Stamina.

talents.name: Strategic Reserve
talents.desc: A character that passes through the <color=#FFD780FF>Jade Screen</color> will gain a 12% <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.

talents.name: Trove of Marvelous Treasures
talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby <color=#FFD780FF>ore veins</color> (Iron Ore, White Iron Ore, Crystal Ore, and Magical Crystal Ore, Starsilver) on the mini-map.

c13ns.name: Piercing Fragments
c13ns.desc: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.

c13ns.name: Shock Effect
c13ns.desc:
When <color=#FFD780FF>Jade Screen</color> is shattered, its CD will reset.
Can occur once every 6s.

c13ns.name: Majesty be the Array of Stars
c13ns.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Starshatter</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All Beneath
c13ns.desc: <color=#FFD780FF>Jade Screen</color> increases nearby characters' Elemental RES by 10%.

c13ns.name: Invincible be the Jade Screen
c13ns.desc:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Jade Screen</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Grandeur be the Seven Stars
c13ns.desc: When <color=#FFD780FF>Starshatter</color> is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.
